TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContractReference extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference

summary.span: 表示发现文档中对服务说明的引用。

span.span: Represents a reference in a discovery document to a service description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web services 发现涉及发现可用的 Web 服务提供一个 URL。XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available Web Services given an URL. 该 URL 通常指向发现文档中，通常具有 a.disco 文件扩展名。The URL usually points to a discovery document, which typically has a.disco file name extension. 在发现文档是对存在有关 XML Web services 的信息的引用。Within a discovery document are references to information about the existence of XML Web services. 这些引用可以引用服务说明、 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构或其他发现文档。These references can refer to service descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas or other discovery documents. 此类表示的服务说明的引用。This class represents a reference to a Service Description. 在发现文档中，对服务说明的引用包含在`contractRef`XML 元素。Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. `contractRef` XML 元素具有两个属性：`ref`和`docRef`。The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes: `ref` and `docRef`. `contractRef`元素必须具有 XML 命名空间匹配常量，而`ref`并`docRef`属性都将置于和属性。The `contractRef` element must have an XML namespace matching the constant, whereas the `ref` and `docRef` attributes are placed in the and properties. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/CPP/contractreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/CS/contractreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/VB/contractreference.vb#1)]
